BIOGRAPHY

Antonella Ruggiero was born in Genoa, Italy and made her first recording, Io Matia ("I Matia" in English), in 1974. It was from the union of some members of both the Jet and Matia that in 1975 the Matia Bazar were born.

In 1975 with Piero Cassano (Voice and Keyboards), Aldo Stellita (Bass), Giancarlo Golzi (Drums), Carlo Marrale (Voice and Guitars) she gave birth to the historical group of Matia Bazar. The unique voice of Antonella Ruggiero in concert with the innovative ability of the other musicians, led the group to achieve outstanding acknowledgments throughout Europe. Immediately after the festival, Antonella released her third CD as soloist, "Sospesa".
